pr_title: Don't omit empty arrays when filtering _source

timeline.message: Don't omit empty arrays when filtering _source

timeline.bodyText: I have not changed anything in the json, only made it a protected static member.
timeline.author: javanna

timeline.bodyText: I guess our map-based filtering will now behave differently than direct xContent filtering. This seems okay to me, since I think it already diverged -- map-based filtering preserves empty objects, whereas xContent filtering doesn't?
timeline.author: jtibshirani

replies.bodyText: yes, preserving empty objects was until now the main difference between the two way of filtering, and with this change we also preserve empty arrays.
replies.author: javanna
